Package com.cloudant.sync.indexing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IndexFunction<T>
    This interface defines the IndexFunction object used to map from document to indexed values by the IndexManager object.
    QueryResult
    Iterable result of a query executed with IndexManager.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FieldIndexFunction
    FieldIndexFunction is a simple IndexFunction which extracts values from a document based on the fieldName given to it.
    IndexManager
    Allows indexes for a Datastore to be defined and queried.
    QueryBuilder
    QueryBuilder builds a query, represented by a Map, which can be used in IndexManager.query(java.util.Map).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IndexType
    The datatype used for an index.
    SortDirection  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IndexExistsException
    Thrown when trying to create an index that already exists.
